column1: Uchi////sadly this place has gone down in quality and quantity
column2: i wish i would have taken a photo of my sushi... it was as small as a bottle cap.. i mean Â tiny its very expensive for what it is.... we spend a whole lot of money on eating out and i wont say we will come back.... we used to go to uchi at least 2 times to 3 times a week that they sent us a gift at the end of the year.....but no more
column3: the sushi size is ridiculously small....not worth the price if you want good sushi go to teppay japanese! its much better quality and tastes amazing!
